text:
Portions are great, super tasty, and the boss is so friendly. We had the XL chicken wrap with fries and it was so delicious. The kebab was also amazing, portions are massive enough for 3-4pax and we love their homemade curry sauce that comes with it. Fries were fresh and crispy. Anyway my husband ordered the food so I don’t know the Turkish names and cannot select the correct recommended items on Google Reviews.

Location is so clean and nice, the drive there from Tuas checkpoint is quick and views are scenic.

The boss was really friendly and my husband probably got too excited and talked too much (he loves Turkish food).

First time to their New Turkish place in JB. Enjoying the tasty food with the pleasant  service of the crews and Boss . If you came over by 2nd link or stay nearby and you miss Turkish taste then just come this place will not be wrong.

The food is so good, delicious, juicy and rich in flavour. Service is very considerate and caring to every customer ensuring full courtesy. Atmosphere also very friendly and relaxing

Highly recommend Dürüm Tavuk, and Pide Tavuklu
Great food and huge portions! Their platters are big and they have salad, soup, fries, and rice besides the meat you choose.

I think this is their new location. I passed by and did a take-away was I was rushing back to Singapore. Generous portion and amazing value. And the kebab I order is so good. I am going back again for sure to try their other offerings.
